messages.msgSnippet: Listowner, The contact details are at; http://www.shaolin-society.co.uk/Contact_-_Class_details/contact_-_class_details.php Regards Michael Listowner
messages.messageBody:
Listowner,

The contact details are at;
http://www.shaolin-society.co.uk/Contact_-_Class_details/contact_-_class_details.php

Regards Michael

Listowner <samurai-listowner@...> wrote:
That entire page from top to bottom is stolen directly from the Samurai
Archives. Unfortunately I can't find an email address for the scumbags
that stole it - if anyone can find any contact information on that
pathetic website, let me know.

Thanks
